#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar
inline void scanInt(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();  //register is more faster than memory.
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
#define pc(x) putchar(x)
inline void writeInt (int n)
{
    int N = n, rev, count = 0;
    rev = N;
    if (N == 0) { pc('0'); pc('\n'); return ;}
    while ((rev % 10) == 0) { count++; rev /= 10;} //obtain the count of the number of 0s
    rev = 0;
    while (N != 0) { rev = (rev<<3) + (rev<<1) + N % 10; N /= 10;}  //store reverse of N in rev
    while (rev != 0) { pc(rev % 10 + '0'); rev /= 10;}
    while (count--) pc('0');
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanInt(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanInt(n);
        if(n==1)
        {
            pc('0');
            pc('\n');
            continue;
        }
        if(n%2==1) writeInt((n/2)*(n/2+1));
        else
        {
            n++;
            writeInt((n/2)*(n/2));
        }
        pc('\n');
    }
}
